trans-unit.source: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 SOAP 版本相关的信息，该版本与消息及其交换关联。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 目前可用的 SOAP 版本为 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。

trans-unit.source: There is an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> for each of these versions of SOAP that can be recovered using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap11%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 每个可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap11%2A> 属性恢复的 SOAP 版本都具有一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> message version that is used to sent and receive XML messages that do not use SOAP formatting.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还有一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> 消息版本可用于收发不使用 SOAP 格式的 XML 消息。

trans-unit.source: The processing roles associated with each message version can be recovered using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.NextDestinationActorValue%2A> property and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.GetUltimateDestinationActorValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 与每个消息版本关联的处理角色可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.NextDestinationActorValue%2A> 属性和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.GetUltimateDestinationActorValues%2A> 方法进行恢复。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to access the methods and properties of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何访问 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 的方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含与最终目标的当前消息版本关联的 SOAP 角色的 URI 名称。

trans-unit.source: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 SOAP1.1，则为空字符串；如果使用 SOAP1.2，则为包含 http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The ultimate receiver is `null` if <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 `null`，最终接收方将为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含与下一目标的当前消息版本关联的 SOAP 角色的 URI 名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next if SOAP1.2 is used; and an empty string if the message version is none.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next使用 SOAP1.1; 如果包含一个字符串http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next使用 SOAP1.2; 如果和空字符串如果消息版本为无。

trans-unit.source: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 获取不使用 SOAP 版本的信封版本。

trans-unit.source: The envelope version not using a SOAP formatting.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 SOAP 格式的信封版本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> message version is used this means that a SOAP envelope is not written out and the message emits the contents of the body.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> 消息版本，这意味着没有写出 SOAP 信封，并且消息发出了正文内容。

trans-unit.source: This enables an [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] channel to communicate with an endpoint that is expecting XML with no SOAP formatting.
trans-unit.target: 这使 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 通道可与期望不带 SOAP 格式的 XML 的终结点进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The XML payload lives in the body of a message and is the only thing emitted when it hits the encoder.
trans-unit.target: XML 负载存在于消息正文中，当它遇到编码器时，只会发出此负载信息。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when the arbitrary chunk of XML is received it is wrapped up in a Message for propagation up the channel stack.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当收到任意 XML 块时，它都将包装在消息中以便向信道堆栈的上层传播。

trans-unit.source: The required headers are inserted and the message is processed as if it had been a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 将插入所需的标头，并将消息视作 SOAP 消息进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SOAP1.1 envelope version.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SOAP1.1 信封版本。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP1.1 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: SOAP1.1 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的架构[SOAP 1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96641)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SOAP1.2 envelope version.
trans-unit.target: 获取 SOAP1.2 信封版本。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP1.2 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: SOAP1.2 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96642).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的架构[SOAP 1.2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=96642)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents the current envelope version.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示当前信封版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current envelope version.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本的信封的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a human-readable string that is culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回区分区域性的可读字符串。
